page.title: 17A Typical Family Weekend.
page.content: As part of our project we selected a family living within the block and kept a diary of a typical weekend.Due to the lack of amenities within the block it was inevitable that the family would have to commute for work, shopping,entertainment etc. The Gittins family live on a small farm.The father is a self-employed plumber and Mrs.Gittins is a house wife who helps on the farm.There are 3 children,Gilian (15) who has just completed her 'o' levels at Welshpool High School.Gary (14) who is in form 4 and Janet (11) who attends our school. It was Janet who kept this diary of events from Friday 28th June. "On Friday night after school,I travelled to Welshpool to attend band practice.I play the cornet. Later I travelled to Guilsfield with my mother to attend a 'linen
